department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家語文碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Hakka Language and Literature, Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 「中古音」是下連漢語現代方言，上通上古音的樞紐。本課程的目標—1.透過國音掌握中古音系統，了解漢語聲韻學的基本知識。2.對客家話、閩南話跟中古音的對應有初步的認識。
goal.en: 1. This course deals with Middle Chinese (MC) phonology.2. Introductory surveys of MC-Hakka and MC-Taiwanese correspondences.

outline.ch: 1. 中古音分類系統。2. 華語、客家話、閩南話跟中古音的對應及語音演變.
outline.en: 1. Middle Chinese (MC), a classificatory system and its terminology. 2. Correspondences between MC and Mandarin, Hakka, and Southern Min.
